SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

br.octahedron.cotopaxi.metadata.annotation
Annotation Type Template

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Template

Annotation to be used to specify a template to be used to present the action response. You should remember that you shoudn't pass the templates root folder. Eg.: if your templates are stored at folder "templates" and you template name is "my_template.vm", thus the template path is "templates/my_template.vm", you should annotated as "my_template.vm" only and set the root folder using a CotopaxiConfigurator. If you didn't set the templates names, it uses the "_.vm" as template name for SUCCESS SuccessActionResponse, "__error.vm" for EXCEPTION SuccessActionResponse and "__invalid.vm" for VALIDATION_FAILED SuccessActionResponse.

Author:
Danilo Penna de Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br
See Also:
CotopaxiConfigView.getTemplateRoot()

Required Element Summary
 String onError
           
 String onSuccess
           
 String onValidationFails
           
 

Element Detail

onSuccess

public abstract String onSuccess
Returns:
The template to be used on model successful execution

onError

public abstract String onError
Returns:
The template to be used on model error execution.

onValidationFails

public abstract String onValidationFails
Returns:
The template to be used on model input validation fails.
